amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $1,500,000 for the Model for Green Laboratories and Clean Rooms project and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part C of House Report 111-233 to strike $1,500,000 for the Model for Green Laboratories and Clean Rooms project and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 338 (Roll no. 673).
